QMES - Queen Mary Robotics and Electronics Society

Who are we?

We are Queen Mary Robotics and Electronics Society, a place for people interested in robot building, arduino, coding, electronics and more! From electronics to meet and build something. Interested in building working cpu, line followers, manipulator arms, flying drones, nuclear missiles, okay maybe not these ones, but for everything else, we got you!

Some of our projects

Smart Greenhouse System

March 01, 2024

Development of an automated greenhouse monitoring and control system using IoT technology and environmental sensors.

IoT automation electronics web development environmental
Read More

6-Axis Robotic Arm

February 01, 2024

Design and construction of a 6-axis robotic arm using 3D printing, servo motors, and inverse kinematics.

robotics 3D printing Arduino Python mechanical design
Read More

Custom Drone Building

January 30, 2024

Build and program custom quadcopter drones, learning about flight dynamics, control systems, and aerial robotics.

drones electronics programming flight control robotics
Read More

Arduino Workshop Series

January 15, 2024

A comprehensive workshop series teaching Arduino basics, from blinking LEDs to complex IoT projects.

Arduino programming electronics workshops IoT
Read More

Building Line Follower Robots

December 23, 2023

A hands-on project where students build autonomous robots that can follow lines using infrared sensors and microcontrollers.

robotics electronics programming Arduino PCB design
Read More
